channel.title: Point to me please
channel.description: I need someone to point me to a server and client that DOES NOT HAVE THE DWARF REMAINS, RESET LOOK, SKILLS AND ITEMS BUG! I downloaded too many server, and tried changing too many things to get it to work. The most recent one that has had this issue was demise's pk server. Unless this bug will always happen no matter what, please point me to a server without this issue!

item.title: Point to me please
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

No such thing.

And if there was, it wouldn’t be available for download. Dwarf remains are just the default item that appears when a null occurs.

Your server was obviously not set-up for that client.

The only thing to do is create your own. Good luck.

Read full topic
